intro: Traffic lights projects with Red, Orange and Green LEDs

build.steps: Place 3 different coloured LEDs on the breadboard

steps: 1.Place a 220 ohm resistor next to each LED on the breadboard
2.Connect each resistor to the postive pin of each LED using breadboarding jumper wires
1.Connect a breadboarding jumper wire from D2 to one side of resistor R1
2.Connect a breadboarding jumper wire from D5 to one side of resistor R2
3.Connect a breadboarding jumper wire from D9 to one side of resistor R3
1.Connect a jumper wire from GND to the negative rail of the breadboard
2.Connect breadboarding jumper wires from negative rail to the negative side of each LED
3.Run the project and then open the Play section
